title: Live coverage: Arianespace to launch an Ariane 6 rocket on its 1st commercial mission
summary: The launch will be managed by Arianespace and will carry the third satellite for the Optical Space Component (CSO– Composante Spatiale Optique) program. Liftoff from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana is set for 1:24 p.m. Kourou time (11:24 a.m. EST, 1624 UTC).

title: Arianespace plans five Ariane 6 launches in 2025, primarily in the second half of the year
summary:
As Arianespace prepares for its first commercial Ariane 6 launch, it is projecting a manifest for the vehicle backloaded to the second half of the year.

title: Arianespace to Launch Second Ariane 6 Rocket on 26 February
summary:
Arianespace has announced that the second flight of the Ariane 6 rocket will take place on 26 February at 5:24 PM CET (1:24 PM local time) from the Guiana Space Centre. The flight will be the rocket’s first commercial flight and will launch the CSO-3 spy satellite for the French Armed Forces. “With this launch […]
The post Arianespace to Launch Second Ariane 6 Rocket on 26 February appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Second Ariane 6 Rocket Takes Shape as Spy Satellite Payload Arrives
summary:
ArianeGroup has shared that the core stage and two boosters for the second flight of the Ariane 6 rocket have been assembled on the ELA4 launch pad at the Guiana Space Centre. At the same time, the flight’s payload, the French CSO-3 spy satellite, arrived at Félix Eboué airport in French Guiana aboard an Antonov […]
The post Second Ariane 6 Rocket Takes Shape as Spy Satellite Payload Arrives appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Ariane 6 central core on the move
Assembly of P120 Boosters for Next Ariane 6 Flight Completed
summary:
ArianeGroup has revealed that a pair of P120 solid-fuel boosters for the second flight of the company’s Ariane 6 rocket have been completed and transferred to the Booster Storage Building. The inaugural flight of the Ariane 6 rocket took place from the Guiana Space Centre in French Guiana in July. While Arianespace, the commercial operator […]

title: Ariane 6 Rocket Stages Arrive in Kourou with a Hitchhiker
summary:
The main and upper stages for the second flight of the Ariane 6 rocket have arrived in French Guiana ahead of its Q1 2025 launch. Accompanying the rocket stages was a helicopter hitchhiker for the aerial logistics service provider Helicojyp.
